node.title: Claire quit her job and sold her possessions — then Omicron changed everything
node.alt: a blonde woman standing in front of a colourful painting
node.description: Claire Ebersohn was only two days away from starting her new life in Australia but global panic over the Omicron strain of COVID-19 has locked her out of the country.
node.content:
["Claire Ebersohn's heart sank when she checked her phone on Saturday and saw her life had been\u00a0up-ended.", "The event manager and her partner had resigned from their jobs and sold their belongings in Cape Town, South Africa\u00a0as part of their final step to\u00a0migrate to Australia.", "They've been waiting two years for the pandemic to calm and were \"emotionally and mentally\" prepared to leave.", "But the global panic over a new COVID-19 \"variant of concern\" \u2014 Omicron \u2014\u00a0had set in and sparked\u00a0border closures to South Africa across the world.", "\"The flights were booked, bags all packed and were ready to go,\" Ms Ebersohn said.", "\"We were only two\u00a0days away from finally leaving.", "\"We were supposed to fly out of\u00a0Qatar and received the news late Friday evening (local time)\u00a0that all flights had been cancelled, effective immediately.\"", "", "
Passengers learning about the mass flight cancellations at\u00a0Johannesburg Airport at the weekend.(Reuters: Sumaya Hisham)
", "Ms Ebersohn is one of dozens of people in southern Africa trying to fly to\u00a0Australia that\u00a0the ABC has spoken with or seen online making desperate pleas for help.", "Although eligible residents are permitted to return to Australia \u2014 although, they must spend 14 days in quarantine \u2014\u00a0the worldwide border closures have made getting there difficult.", "Kathleen, who did not wish to use her real name, arrived in\u00a0the Eastern Cape in South Africa on November 11 to attend her father's funeral.", "Her flight back to Australia\u00a0was abruptly cancelled and she's been on the phone\u00a0for days with the Australian High Commission in South Africa and different airlines trying to secure a seat home.", "She's had little luck and says she's been in stuck in \"limbo\".", "\"The consulate in Pretoria has just told us to wait it out,\" Kathleen said.", "", "
Travellers from South Africa were\u00a0locked out of their home countries due to fears around Omicron.(Reuters:\u00a0Siphiwe Sibeko)
", "Several carriers\u00a0such as Singapore Airlines, Qatar and Emirates have cancelled scheduled flights out of the country.", "\"So while the Australian government says we can return, there isn't any way for us to do that,\" Kathleen said.", "A Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade (DFAT) spokesperson said \"no further government facilitated flights are currently scheduled from South Africa\".", "\"We continue to monitor demand for government facilitated commercial flights,\" they said.", "The ABC understands federal government facilitated flights are scheduled to depart from Singapore and Pakistan later this month.", "Ms Ebersohn said she was just waiting for everything\u00a0to \"blow over\" but was growing anxious about her prospects of returning.", "\"It's the uncertainty we have need to deal with, we had given up everything and now we have no line of sight on the way forward,\" she said.", "", "
Claire Ebersohn and her partner were ready to start a new life in Australia.(Instagram: Claire Ebersohn)
", "She said she would have\u00a0to dip into her savings\u00a0while in a holding pattern and would\u00a0gladly pay any quarantine costs if it meant being able to enter Australia.", "\"We're very thankful we don't have kids,\" Ms Ebersohn said.", "\"There are many South African\u00a0families sitting in even worse situations.\"", "Kathleen was one of those people.", "\"My husband and kids are back in Melbourne and at the moment, I don't think they'll see me for Christmas,\" she said.", "\"They've had a horrible year. My poor children have been through both their grandfathers dying this year \u2014 they never got to say goodbye.\"", "Kathleen felt the federal government had\u00a0\"abandoned\" her and other stranded travellers by not organising repatriation flights.", "She was especially upset because she had been diligent about the rules, which resulted in\u00a0her narrowly missing seeing her father before he died.", "\"I got vaccinated, I waited until the borders reopened, I got my negative PCR tests and did all my documentation,\" Kathleen said.", "\"I don't have faith in the promises made to Australians\u00a0who are vaccinated and followed the rules.\"", "", "
Heavily mutated Omicron variant puts scientist on alert
"]
